short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension provides serial port access ability for your website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome app provides serial port access ability for your website.

You can easily send/receive data to/from your devices like Arduino, Raspberry Pi and other MCUs through serial ports of your PC.

An example here "https://jsfiddle.net/strawmanbobi/nt4x3c23/" shows how to use it.

Open source project on Github : https://github.com/strawmanbobi/web-com
